media:group.media:title: Vanazdorโs industrial past
media:group.media:description:
Nestled in the mountains of northern Armenia is Vanadzor - the countryโs third largest city and the heart of the Lori region. The city was the central hub of Armenian industrial manufacturing during the Soviet Union.
To honor this heritage, Mit Mission held a 3 day event in Vanadzor. The program included various speakers and hands-on workshops.

entry.title: Zimeray porte l'affaire ร la CPI

media:group.media:title: Zimeray porte l'affaire ร la CPI
media:group.media:description:
Dans cet entretien, Franรงois Zimeray, ancien membre du Parlement europรฉen, dรฉvoile les coulisses de sa dรฉmarche audacieuse auprรจs de la Cour Pรฉnale Internationale concernant la situation en Artsakh. Zimeray offre un รฉclairage unique sur les dรฉfis rencontrรฉs et les espoirs suscitรฉs par cette action, illustrant ainsi le rรดle crucial de la diplomatie et de la justice dans la rรฉsolution des conflits contemporains.

entry.title: Soviet Displaced Persons and the Birth of the Cold War

media:group.media:title: Soviet Displaced Persons and the Birth of the Cold War
media:group.media:description:
Australian historian Sheila Fitzpatrick gave a talk entitled โLost Souls: Soviet Displaced Persons and the Birth of the Cold Warโ at a symposium organized by the Monterey Initiative in Russian Studies at the Middlebury Institute of International Studies at Monterey. The lecture took place on July 10 in Tbilisi.
Sheila Fitzpatrick is renowned for her expertise in Soviet and modern Russian history, particularly during Joseph Stalinโs rule.
This yearโs Monterey Summer Symposium on Russia took place in Yerevan, Tbilisi, and Istanbul from July 1 to July 20.

entry.title: Tufenkian Foundation's 25 years of service and impact

media:group.media:title: Tufenkian Foundation's 25 years of service and impact
media:group.media:description:
Greg Bedian, Director of Operations at the Tufenkian Foundation, speaks with CivilNet about the Foundation's 25-year journey in Armenia and Artsakh, and its evolving role in the regions, particularly in light of the recent humanitarian challenges. Reflecting on past accomplishments and major setbacks, he shares insights on the Foundationโs commitment to developing regions such as Syunik, which are not only a safe haven for displaced families from Artsakh but also hubs for economic growth and opportunities.

media:group.media:title: ยซิฑีพึีธึีกีตีซยปี ีซึ ีฟีฅีฝีกีฏีซ ีดีฅีป ีกีผีกีปีซีถ ีีกึีคีธึ ีซึีกีพีธึีถึีถีฅึีซ ึ ีดีกึีคีกีฝีซึีธึีฉีตีกีถ ึีธึีธึีดีจ
media:group.media:description:
ยซิฑีพึีธึีกยป ีดีกึีคีกีฝีซึีกีฏีกีถ ีถีกีญีกีฑีฅีผีถีธึีฉีตีธึีถีจ, ีธึีจ ีฑีฃีฟีธึีด ีง ีฌีธึีฎีฅีฌ ีดีกึีคีกีฝีซึีกีฏีกีถ ีญีถีคีซึีถีฅึีถ ีกีทีญีกึีฐีซ ีฟีกึีขีฅึ ีกีถีฏีตีธึีถีถีฅึีธึีด, ีดีกีตีซีฝีซีถ ีฝีฏีฝีฅึ ีซึ ีฟีฅีฝีกีฏีซ ีดีฅีป ีกีผีกีปีซีถ ยซีีกึีคีธึ ีซึีกีพีธึีถึีถีฅึีซ ึ ีดีกึีคีกีฝีซึีธึีฉีตีกีถ ึีธึีธึีดีจยปี UCLA-ีซี ิผีธีฝ ิฑีถีปีฅีฌีฅีฝีซ ิฟีกีฌีซึีธึีถีซีกีตีซ ีฐีกีดีกีฌีฝีกึีกีถีซ ิปึีกีพีกีฃีซีฟีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีคีบึีธึีซ ยซิฝีธีฝีฟีธึีดยป ีดีกึีคีธึ ีซึีกีพีธึีถึีถีฅึีซ ีซีถีฝีฟีซีฟีธึีฟีซ ีฐีฅีฟ ีฐีกีดีกีฟีฅีฒึ
ีีธึีธึีดีถ ีกีทีญีกึีฐีซ ีกีผีกีปีกีฟีกึ ีดีกึีคีกีฝีซึีกีฏีกีถ ีฏีกีฆีดีกีฏีฅึีบีธึีฉีตีธึีถีถีฅึีซีถ ีฐีกึีฉีกีฏ ีง ีฟึีกีดีกีคึีธึีดี ีกีดีฅีถีกีฐึีกีฟีกีบ ีฐีธึีดีกีถีซีฟีกึ ีดีกึีฟีกีฐึีกีพีฅึีถีฅึีซ ีพีฅึีกีขีฅึีตีกีฌ ีญีธึึีกีตีซีถ ึีถีถีกึีฏีธึีดีถีฅึีซ ีฐีกีดีกึ: ีีธึีธึีดีซ ีดีฅีฏีถีกึีฏีถ ีกีฆีคีกึีกึีฅึ ยซิฑีพึีธึีกยป-ีซ ีฐีกีดีกีฐีซีดีถีกีคีซึ ึ ีีถึ ึีฅีถีถีฅึีซ ีญีธึีฐึีคีซ ีถีกีญีกีฃีกีฐ ีีธึีขีกึ ิฑึีฅีตีกีถีจ:
2024-ีซ ยซิฑีพึีธึีกยป-ีซ ีดีซีปีธึีกีผีธึีดีถีฅึีจ, ีกีตีค ีฉีพีธึีด 2024-ีซ ยซิฑีพึีธึีกยป ีดึึีกีถีกีฏีซ ีทีถีธึีฐีดีกีถ ีกึีกึีธีฒีธึีฉีตีธึีถีจ, ีฟีฅีฒีซ ีฅีถ ีธึีถีฅึีฅีฌ ีดีกีตีซีฝีซ 8-ีซึ 10-ีจ ิผีธีฝ ิฑีถีปีฅีฌีฅีฝีธึีดึ

media:group.media:description:
ีีกีตีกีฝีฟีกีถีจ ีขีกึีฑึ ีฎีฅึีกึีดีกีถ ึีธึึีซีน ีธึีถีฅึีธีฒ ีฅึีฏึีถีฅึีซ ีทีกึึีธึีด ีง, ึีกีฝีฟีธึีด ีฅีถ ีดีซีปีกีฆีฃีกีตีซีถ ีนีกึีกีถีซีทีถีฅึีจึ ีิฑิฟ-ีซ ีขีถีกีฏีนีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีฐีซีดีถีกีคึีกีดีซ ีฐีฅีฟีกีฆีธีฟีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีฐีกีดีกีฑีกีตีถี 2050 ีฉีพีกีฏีกีถีซีถ ีีกีตีกีฝีฟีกีถีธึีด ีฎีฅึีฅึีซ ีฉีซีพีจ ีฏีฃีฅึีกีฆีกีถึีซ 30 ีฟีธีฏีธีฝีจ: ีีกีตีกีฝีฟีกีถีธึีด 60-ีซึ ีขีกึีฑึ ีฟีกึีซึีกีตีซีถ ีญีดีขีซ ีดีกึีคีฏีกีถึ ีญีถีคีซึีถีฅึีจ ึีซีน ีนีฅีถี ีฝีธึีซีกีฌีกีฏีกีถ, ีกีผีธีฒีปีกีฏีกีถ, ีฆีขีกีฒีพีกีฎีธึีฉีตีกีถึ
